21850.en:
I'm so nervous about this military meeting. I wonder what Dura-kun has found out about the revival of
Kukulkannibal.
21850.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「……緊張しますね　軍議なんて。
　ドゥラくんは　天魔クァバルナの復活について
　何を　突き止めたのでしょうか……。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21850.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: ……군사 회의라니 긴장되네요.
　두라는 천마 콰바르나의 부활에 대해
　대체 뭘 알아낸 걸까요……?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21850.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>……军事会议真是让人紧张。
针对天魔夸巴尔那的复活，
杜拉到底掌握到什么了……？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21850.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>……軍事會議真是讓人緊張。
針對天魔夸亞巴爾納的復活，
杜拉到底掌握到什麼了……？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21851.en: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>It looks like it's starting.<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21851.ja: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「始まるみたいですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21851.ko: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 시작하려는 모양이네요.<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21851.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>好像要开始了。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21851.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>好像要開始了。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21852.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>We will now begin the Dolworm
classified military discussion!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21852.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「それでは　これより
　ドルワーム機密軍議を　始める！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21852.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그럼 지금부터
　도르웜 기밀 군사 회의를 시작하겠다!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21852.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>接下来将进行
多尔瓦姆机密军事会议！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21852.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>接下來將進行
多爾瓦姆機密軍事會議！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21853.en:
First, a follow-up to my earlier report on the resurrection of Kukulkannibal. I hope everyone will
take this to heart.
21853.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「まずは　以前　報告した
　天魔クァバルナの　復活に関する続報だ。
　皆　心して聞いてほしい。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21853.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 우선 전에 얘기한
　천마 콰바르나의 부활에 관한 새로운 소식이다.
　모두 집중해서 들어주기 바란다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21853.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>首先是以前报告过的
天魔夸巴尔那复活的相关续报，
希望大家专心听。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21853.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>首先是以前報告過的
天魔夸亞巴爾納復活的相關續報，
希望大家專心聆聽。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21854.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Since then, I have studied every bit
of this Heavenly Demon Apocalypse.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21854.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「……私は　あれから　この天魔黙示録を
　余すことなく　調べ上げた。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21854.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: ……난 그 뒤로 이 천마묵시록을
　샅샅이 살펴보았다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21854.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……我从那之后，就在彻底调查
天魔默示录。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21854.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……我從那之後，就徹底調查
天魔默示錄。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21855.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>And then we came upon a frightening
fact about the resurgence of Quava
Luna.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21855.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「そして　クァバルナ復活に関する
　恐るべき事実に　たどりついたのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21855.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그 결과, 콰바르나 부활에 관한
　무시무시한 사실을 알아냈다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21855.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>然后我发现一个和
夸巴尔那复活有关的恐怖事实。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21855.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>然後我發現一個和
夸亞巴爾納復活有關的恐怖事實。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21856.en: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>A frightening fact.<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21856.ja: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「恐るべき事実……。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21856.ko: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 무시무시한 사실…….<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21856.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>恐怖事实……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21856.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>恐怖事實……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21857.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>In the Tianmai Revelation, it is
written.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21857.ja: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「天魔黙示録には　こう書かれている。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21857.ko: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 천마묵시록에는 이렇게 기록되어 있다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21857.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>天魔默示录是这么写的。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21857.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>天魔默示錄是這麼寫的。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21858.en:
Long ago, Kukulkannibal emerged from the deep darkness and reigned over the land of Dolworm. He brought misfortune
and suffering to his people.
21858.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「……天魔クァバルナは　遠い昔
　深き闇より現れ　ドルワームの地に君臨した。
　幾多の災いをもたらし　民は　なげき苦しんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21858.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: ……천마 콰바르나는 먼 옛날
　깊은 어둠 속에서 나타나 도르웜에 군림했고
　많은 재앙을 초래해 백성을 도탄에 빠뜨렸다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21858.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……天魔夸巴尔那在遥远的古代，
从黑暗中出现，君临多尔瓦姆大地。
他带来莫大灾难，人民痛苦不堪。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21858.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……天魔夸亞巴爾納在遙遠的古代，
從黑暗中出現，君臨多爾瓦姆大地。
他帶來莫大災難，人民痛苦不堪。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21859.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Kukulkannibal will never perish. When
healed in the underworld, he will
return to this world again.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21859.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「天魔クァバルナは　滅することがない。
　冥界にて　キズを癒やすと
　ふたたび　現世に　舞い戻ってくる……。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21859.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 하지만 천마 콰바르나는 불멸의 존재이기에
　명계에서 상처를 치유하고 나면
　다시금 현세로 돌아온다…….<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21859.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>天魔夸巴尔那并没有被消灭。
他在冥界将伤势疗养好后，
又会再次回到世间……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21859.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>天魔夸亞巴爾納並沒有被消滅。
他在冥界將傷勢療養好後，
又會再次回到世間……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21860.en:
And, with the grudge and curse of a previous life, he will take on an even stronger body, giving us endless
despair.
21860.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「そして……　前世の恨みと呪いにより
　さらに強靭な肉体を　たずさえ
　我らに　果てなき絶望を与えるだろう……。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21860.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그리고…… 전세에서의 원한과 저주로
　더 강력한 육체를 얻어
　우리에게 끝없는 절망을 안길 것이다…….<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21860.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>然后……他会心怀前世的怨恨与诅咒，
带着更强大的肉体，
带给我们无尽的绝望……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21860.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>然後……他會心懷前世的怨恨與詛咒，
帶著更強大的肉體，
帶給我們無盡的絕望……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21861.en:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Oh, no. You mean that Quava Luna is
coming back with more power? To this
Dolworm!<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21861.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「そんな……。あのクァバルナが
　パワーアップして　帰ってくるってこと？
　この　ドルワームに……！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21861.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 그럴 수가……. 콰바르나가
　더 강해져서 돌아온단 말이야?
　이곳 도르웜으로……!?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21861.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>怎么会……你是说，那个夸巴尔那
会变得更强再次回来吗？
回到这个多尔瓦姆……！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21861.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>怎麼會……你是說，那個夸亞巴爾納
會變得更強回來嗎？
來到這個多爾瓦姆……！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21862.en: <start_lip_sync n00638 _normal m00001>Oh my god. Is Dolworm cursed?<stop_lip_animation n00638 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21862.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00638 _normal m00001>「なんてことだ……。
　ドルワームは　呪われているのか……？<stop_lip_animation n00638 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21862.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00638 _normal m00001>: 맙소사…….
　도르웜은 저주받은 건가……?<stop_lip_animation n00638 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21862.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00638 _normal m00001>怎么会这样……
多尔瓦姆是受到诅咒了吗……？<stop_lip_animation n00638 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21862.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00638 _normal m00001>怎麼會這樣……
多爾瓦姆是受到詛咒了嗎……？<stop_lip_animation n00638 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21863.en: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Yes. It has begun. A chain of despair.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21863.ja: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「そう。始まったのだ。絶望の連鎖が……。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21863.ko: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그래, 시작되고 만 거다. 절망의 연쇄가…….<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21863.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>是的，已经开始了，绝望的连环……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21863.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>是的，已經開始了，絕望的連環……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21864.en:
If Quava Luna can come back to life over and over again, what the hell are we supposed to do? Dolworm will be
hunted forever!
21864.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「クァバルナが　何度でも　よみがえるなら
　ボクらは　いったい　どうすればいいの！？
　ドルワームは　永遠に　狙われるってこと！？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21864.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 콰바르나가 끊임없이 부활한다면
　우린 어떡하면 좋지!?
　도르웜은 영원히 놈의 표적이 된단 거야!?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21864.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>既然夸巴尔那会一直复活，
那我们到底该怎么办才好？！
多尔瓦姆永远都要担心受怕吗？！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21864.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>既然夸亞巴爾納會一直復活，
那我們到底該怎麼辦才好！？
多爾瓦姆永遠都要擔心受怕嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21865.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>There is only one way to escape this
crisis.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21865.ja: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「この危機を逃れる方法は　ただ　ひとつ……。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21865.ko: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 이 위기에서 벗어날 방법은 단 하나…….<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21865.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>只有一个办法可以躲过这个危机……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21865.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>只有一個辦法可以躲過這個危機……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21866.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>If we cannot destroy his body, our
only recourse is to seal
Kukulkannibal.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21866.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「やつの身体を　滅することができないのであれば
　我々に　残された手段は　天魔クァバルナを
　封印する以外にない。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21866.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 놈이 불멸의 존재라면
　우리에게 남은 수단은 천마 콰바르나를
　봉인하는 것밖에 없다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21866.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>既然没有办法消灭天魔夸巴尔那的身体，
我们唯一的办法，
就是封印那家伙。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21866.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>既然無法消滅天魔夸亞巴爾納的身體，
我們唯一的辦法，就是封印那傢伙。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21867.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>In fact, even before Quava Luna
appeared here, he was sealed. Our
ancestors chose the same path.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21867.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「……事実　クァバルナが　ここに現れる前も
　やつは　封印されていた。
　先人たちも　同じ道を選んだのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21867.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: ……실제로 콰바르나가 이곳에 나타나기 전에도
　놈은 봉인되어 있었다.
　선조들도 같은 선택을 한 거지.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21867.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……实际上，在夸巴尔那出现在这里前，
也是被封印住的。
祖先们也是选了一样的办法。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21867.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……實際上，在夸亞巴爾納出現在這裡前，
也是被封印住的。
祖先們也是選了一樣的辦法。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21868.en:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>I see. So it's sealed. But, Dura-kun.
But, Dura, how easy is it to seal
something?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21868.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「なるほど　封印か……。でも　ドゥラくん。
　封印なんて　簡単に　できるものなの？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21868.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 그렇군, 봉인이라……. 하지만, 두라.
　그렇게 쉽게 봉인할 수 있을까?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21868.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>原来如此，封印啊……可是，杜拉，
封印那么简单就能做到吗？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21868.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>原來如此，封印啊……可是，杜拉，
封印那麼簡單就能做到嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21869.en:
Two elements are necessary for sealing. First, the resurrected Kukulkannibal must be weakened to the
point of death.
21869.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「封印のために　必要な要素は　ふたつ。
　まずは　復活した天魔クァバルナを
　死の寸前まで　弱らせること。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21869.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 봉인에 필요한 요소는 두 가지다.
　우선 부활한 천마 콰바르나를
　죽기 직전까지 약화시킬 것.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21869.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>为了进行封印，需要两个条件。
首先就是让复活过来的天魔夸巴尔那，
弱化到濒死的状态。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21869.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>為了進行封印，需要兩個條件。
首先就是讓復活過來的天魔夸亞巴爾納，
弱化到快要死掉的程度。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21870.en:
And if you put Zekir's Holy Stake, which contains the power of a seal, into his chest, you can seal Kwaba
Luna in the depths of the earth.
21870.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「そして　封印のチカラを宿した聖具
　ゼキルの聖杭を　やつの胸に突き立てれば……
　クァバルナを　地の底に封印できる。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21870.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그리고 봉인의 힘이 깃든 성물
　제킬의 신성한 말뚝을 놈의 가슴에 박으면……
　콰바르나를 깊은 심연 속에 봉인할 수 있다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21870.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>接着把带有封印力量的圣具，
也就是扎吉尔圣桩，刺进夸巴尔那胸膛……
就能将他封印在地底。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21870.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>接著把帶有封印力量的聖具，
也就是傑奇爾聖樁，刺進夸亞巴爾納胸膛……
就能將他封印在地底。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21871.en:
Zekir's Holy Stake is not yet in our possession. However, as long as I have the right ingredients, I can make it
myself, so that should not be a problem.
21871.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ゼキルの聖杭は　まだ　我々の手にはない。
　しかし　材料さえ　そろえば
　私の手で作りだせるので　問題ないだろう。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21871.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 제킬의 신성한 말뚝은 아직 우리 수중에 없다.
　하지만 재료만 모으면
　내가 만들 수 있으니 문제없겠지.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21871.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>我们还没有扎吉尔圣桩。
但只要收集到材料，
我就可以制作出来，所以没问题。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21871.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>我們還沒有傑奇爾聖樁。
但只要收集到材料，
我就可以製作出來，所以沒問題。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21872.en:
I want all members of the Royal Knights to engage in combat training in preparation for the coming day of
decisive battle.
21872.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「王立騎士団の者は　来たるべき　決戦の日に備え
　戦闘訓練に　従事してほしい。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21872.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 왕립 기사단원들은 다가올 결전에 대비해
　전투 훈련에 힘써주기 바란다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21872.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>王立骑士团的诸位，为了备战
即将到来的决战，请投入战斗训练。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21872.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>希望王立騎士團的人進行嚴格的戰鬥訓練，
以備決戰的日子到來。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21873.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I will ask <pc> to gather the
materials necessary to make Zekir's
Holy Stake. More on that later.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21873.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「<pc>さんには　ゼキルの聖杭を作るのに
　必要な材料を　集めてもらおうと思います。
　のちほど　くわしく　お話ししましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21873.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨는 제킬의 신성한 말뚝에
　필요한 재료를 모아 와 주셨으면 합니다.
　나중에 자세히 설명드리죠.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21873.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>要请<pc>去收集制作
扎吉尔圣桩所需的材料。
之后我会详细告诉你需要什么。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21873.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>要請<pc>去收集製作
傑奇爾聖樁所需的材料。
之後我會詳細告訴你需要什麼。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21874.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I thought the above was the best way
to deal with Kukulkannibal. No
objections?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21874.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「……以上が　天魔クァバルナを迎え撃つ
　最良の策だと　私は考えた。
　異論はないな？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21874.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: ……난 이상이 천마 콰바르나에게 맞설
　가장 좋은 방법이라고 생각한다.
　이론은 없겠지?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21874.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……以上就是我认为对抗
天魔夸巴尔那的最佳办法。
有人有意见吗？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21874.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……以上就是我認為對抗
天魔夸亞巴爾納的最佳辦法。
有人有意見嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21875.en:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Dura-kun, that's great. I'm sure that
strategy will work!<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21875.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「……ドゥラくん　すごいよ。
　その作戦なら　きっと　うまくいくよ！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21875.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: ……두라, 굉장해.
　그 작전이라면 틀림없이 성공할 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21875.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>……杜拉，你好厉害，
这个战略一定会成功！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21875.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>……杜拉，你好厲害，
這個戰略一定會成功！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21876.en:
With that, this classified military meeting is adjourned! I urge each of you to do your utmost to deal with the
situation!
21876.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「それでは　以上をもって
　今回の機密軍議は　閉会とする！
　各自　全力で　対応に当たるようにッ！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21876.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그럼 이것으로
　이번 기밀 군사 회의를 마치겠다!
　각자 최선을 다해 대응에 나서도록!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21876.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>那么这次的机密军事会议
到此为止！
请各位尽全力做好各自的工作！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21876.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>那麼這次的機密軍事會議
到此為止！
請各位盡全力做好各自的工作！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21877.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001><pc>. As I mentioned earlier,
we need you to gather the materials
for Zekir's Holy Stake.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21877.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。
　先ほど　お話しした通り　ゼキルの聖杭の材料を
　あなたに　集めてきてもらいたいのです。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21877.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨, 조금 전에 말씀드렸듯이
　제킬의 신성한 말뚝의 재료를
　당신이 모아 와 주셨으면 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21877.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001><pc>，
如刚才所说，我希望你去收集
制作扎吉尔圣桩的材料。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21877.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001><pc>，
如剛剛所說，我希望你去收集
傑奇爾聖樁的材料。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21878.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>To make Zekir's Holy Stake, two
materials are needed: a Gold Ring and
a Holy Branch.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21878.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ゼキルの聖杭を作るために　必要な材料は
　きんのゆびわと　聖木の枝の　ふたつ。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21878.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 제킬의 신성한 말뚝 제작에 필요한 재료는
　금반지와 성목의 가지, 이 두 가지입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21878.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>制作扎吉尔圣桩，需要
金戒指和圣树的树枝。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21878.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>製作傑奇爾聖樁，需要
金指環和聖樹的樹枝。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21879.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Gold rings can be purchased at the
Accessory Shop in Verinard Castle Town
on the Wena Islands.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21879.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「きんのゆびわは　ウェナ諸島にある
　ヴェリナード城下町の　アクセサリーショップで
　購入することができます。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21879.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 금반지는 웨나 제도에 있는
　베리나드 시가지의 액세서리 상점에서
　구입할 수 있습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21879.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>金戒指可以去维纳群岛的
威里纳德城区，
在饰品商店购买。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21879.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>金指環可以在
維納群島的威里納德城鎮
飾品商店購買。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21880.en:
Holy Branch is dropped by <%sev_que_name0> in the southeastern part of Orphea Region West, across the
river and in Cursed Land.
21880.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「聖木の枝は　オルフェア地方西の南東
　川を渡った地や　呪われた大地などにいる
　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>が　落とします。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21880.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 성목의 가지는 오르페어 지방 서부의 남동쪽
　강 건너편이나 저주받은 땅 등지에 있는
　{%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(이,가) 떨어뜨립니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21880.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>欧鲁非亚西部地区东南边河流对面的地方
或是被诅咒的大地等地栖息着的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
会掉落圣树的树枝。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21880.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>至於聖樹的樹枝，
則是在越過歐菲亞地方西部的東南方河流一帶
或是被詛咒的大地出沒的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>會掉落。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21881.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>You are the one who can move freely
around the world, and we need you to
take on this job. Will you help us?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21881.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「世界を自由に動ける　あなたにこそ
　この仕事を　引き受けてもらいたいのです。
　ご協力　願えませんか？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21881.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 당신은 세상을 자유로이 돌아다닐 수 있으니
　꼭 이 일을 맡아 주셨으면 합니다.
　도와주시겠습니까?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21881.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>你可以在这世界自由活动，
所以我希望你能接下这工作。
你愿意帮忙吗？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21881.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>你可以自由在這世界活動，
所以我希望你能接下這工作。
你願意幫忙嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26333.en:
I have been asked to do a quest. Do
you accept this quest?
<select>
Accept
Stop
<select_end><close>
26333.ja:
クエストを　依頼されました。
このクエストを　受けますか？
<select>
うける
やめる
<select_end><close>
26333.ko:
퀘스트 의뢰를 받았습니다.
이 퀘스트를 수락하겠습니까?
<select>
수락하기
그만두기
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hans:
对方委托了任务。
要接受这个任务吗？
<select>
接受
放弃
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hant:
對方提出了任務委託。
是否要承接這件任務？
<select>
承接
放棄
<select_end><close>

21882.en:
Thank you . I am back in the Director's room, so please come back there when you have all the
materials.
21882.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ありがとうございます　<pc>さん。
　私は　院長室に戻っていますので
　材料が　そろったら　そちらへお願いします。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21882.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 감사합니다, <pc> 씨.
　전 원장실에 있을 테니
　재료를 다 모으면 그쪽으로 와 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21882.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>谢谢你，<pc>。
我回院长室了，
所以你收集到材料的话，请拿到那里。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21882.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>謝謝你，<pc>。
我會回院長室，
所以你收集到材料的話，請拿到那裡。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21890.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Oh <pc>. Trouble is, you seem
to have a lot of requests from others.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21890.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「……おや　<pc>さん。
　困ったことに　あなたは　他の方の依頼を
　たくさん抱えておいでのようだ。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21890.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: ……이런, <pc> 씨.
　당신은 이미 다른 분들의 의뢰를
　많이 받은 상태인 것 같군요.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21890.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……哦，<pc>，
令人头痛的是，你好像接下了
很多其他人的委托。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21890.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……喔，<pc>，
令人頭痛的是，你好像接下了
很多其他人的委託。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29830.en:
However, your cooperation is essential to the sealing of Kukulkannibal. Will you come back here when your hands are
free?
29830.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「しかし　天魔クァバルナの封印には
　あなたの協力が　不可欠です。
　手が空いたら　ここに戻ってきてくれませんか？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29830.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 하지만 천마 콰바르나를 봉인하려면
　당신의 도움이 꼭 필요합니다.
　여유가 생기면 다시 이곳으로 와 주시겠습니까?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29830.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>但要封印天魔夸巴尔那
必须有你的协助才行。
等你有空了，可以回到这里吗？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29830.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>但要封印天魔夸亞巴爾納
必須有你的協助才行。
等你有空了，可以回到這裡嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21891.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I see. That's a problem. You don't
belong to Dolworm, so I can't order
you to do anything.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21891.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「……そうですか。それは　困りました。
　あなたは　ドルワームの者ではないので
　命令するわけにも　いきませんしね。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21891.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: ……그러십니까. 난감하게 됐군요.
　당신은 도르웜의 국민이 아니니
　명령을 내릴 수도 없고…….<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21891.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……这样啊，这可麻烦了。
你也不是多尔瓦姆的人，
我没法命令你。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21891.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……這樣啊，這可麻煩了。
你也不是多爾瓦姆的人，
我沒辦法命令你。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29831.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>But your cooperation is essential to
the sealing of Kukulkannibal. If you
change your mind, come back here.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29831.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「しかし　天魔クァバルナの封印には
　あなたの協力が　不可欠です。
　気が変わったら　ここに戻ってきてください。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29831.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 하지만 천마 콰바르나를 봉인하려면
　당신의 도움이 꼭 필요합니다.
　마음이 바뀌면 다시 여기로 와 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29831.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>但要封印天魔夸巴尔那
必须有你的协助才行。
你要是改变主意了，就再过来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29831.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>但要封印天魔夸亞巴爾納
必須有你的協助才行。
你要是改變主意了，就再過來吧。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21884.en: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Dura-kun! Are you okay!<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21884.ja: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ドゥラくん！　大丈夫！？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21884.ko: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 두라! 괜찮아!?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21884.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>杜拉！你没事吧？！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21884.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>杜拉！你沒事吧！？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21885.en:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Could it be that the curse of Quava
Luna has taken over Dura-kun's body?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21885.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「もしかして……　クァバルナの呪いが
　ドゥラくんの身体を……？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21885.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 설마…… 콰바르나의 저주가
　두라의 몸을……?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21885.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>该不会……夸巴尔那的诅咒
侵袭杜拉的身体……？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21885.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>該不會……夸亞巴爾納的詛咒
侵襲杜拉的身體……？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21886.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Don't worry Prince Ramiza, I've just
been working tirelessly on Quava Luna
for the past few days.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21886.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「……ご心配なく　ラミザ王子。
　ただ　このところ　不眠不休で
　クァバルナのことを　調べていたもので……。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21886.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: ……걱정 마십시오, 라미자 왕자님.
　최근에 제대로 쉬지도, 자지도 않고
　콰바르나에 대해 조사했던 터라…….<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21886.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……别担心，拉米撒王子。
我是最近不眠不休
调查夸巴尔那才会这样……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21886.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……別擔心，拉米撒王子。
我是最近不眠不休
調查夸亞巴爾納才會這樣……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21887.en:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>I see. Well, then, we've decided on a
plan, and we'll be fine now. Dura-kun,
take a good rest.<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21887.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「……そっか。それなら
　作戦は　決まったんだし　もう大丈夫だよ。
　ドゥラくんは　ゆっくり休んで。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21887.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: ……그렇구나.
　그럼 작전은 결정됐으니 이제 걱정 말고
　두라는 푹 쉬어.<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21887.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>……是吗？战略已经
都定好了，你可以放松了。
杜拉你就好好休息吧。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21887.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>……是嗎？戰略已經
都定好了，你可以放鬆了。
杜拉你就好好休息吧。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21888.en:
Thank you very much for your kind attention. I will take a rest when I return to the Director's room. Good
bye.
21888.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「……お心づかい　痛み入ります。
　院長室に戻ったら　すこし休むとしましょう。
　それでは……。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21888.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: ……마음 써 주셔서 감사합니다.
　원장실에 돌아가면 좀 쉬도록 하겠습니다.
　그럼…….<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21888.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……谢谢您的关心。
等我回到院长室，我会稍微休息一下。
我先离开了……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21888.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……謝謝您的關心。
等我回到院長室，我會稍微休息一下。
我先離開了……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21889.en:
I'm going back to knight captain room. I will be looking forward to seeing you at Zekir's Holy
Stake.
21889.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ボクも　騎士団長室に戻ります。
　<pc>さん　ゼキルの聖杭の件
　よろしくお願いしますね。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21889.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 저도 기사단장실로 돌아가겠습니다.
　<pc> 씨, 제킬의 신성한 말뚝을
　잘 부탁드릴게요.<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21889.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>我也要回骑士团长室了。
<pc>，扎吉尔圣桩
就麻烦你了。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21889.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>我也要回騎士團長室了。
<pc>，
傑奇爾聖樁的事就麻煩你了。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

21892.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Oh <pc>. You've come back to
offer us a helping hand, haven't you?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21892.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ああ　<pc>さん。
　我々に　救いの手を差し伸べるため
　戻ってきてくれたんですね？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21892.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 아아, <pc> 씨.
　저희에게 도움의 손길을 내밀려고
　돌아와 주셨군요?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21892.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>啊啊，<pc>，
你为了对我们伸出援手，
又回来了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21892.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>啊啊，<pc>，
你為了對我們伸出援手，
又回來了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21893.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>The only way to defeat the resurrected
Kukulkannibal is to seal him up. For
that, we need Zekir's Holy Stake.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21893.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「復活する　天魔クァバルナに対抗するには
　やつを　封印する以外　道はありません。
　そのためには　ゼキルの聖杭が　必要なのです。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21893.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 부활하는 천마 콰바르나에게 대항하려면
　놈을 봉인하는 것 외에는 길이 없습니다.
　그러려면 제킬의 신성한 말뚝이 필요하죠.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21893.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>要对抗复活的天魔夸巴尔那，
只能用封印的办法了。
因此我们需要扎吉尔圣桩。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21893.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>要對抗復活的天魔夸亞巴爾納，
只能用封印的辦法了。
因此我們需要傑奇爾聖樁。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21894.en:
To make Zekir's Holy Stake, you will need two materials: a Gold Ring and a Holy Branch. I want you to gather
these materials.
21894.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ゼキルの聖杭を作るために　必要な材料は
　きんのゆびわと　聖木の枝の　ふたつ。
　あなたには　これらを集めてきてほしいのです。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21894.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 제킬의 신성한 말뚝 제작에 필요한 재료는
　금반지와 성목의 가지.
　당신은 이 두 가지를 모아 오셨으면 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21894.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>制作扎吉尔圣桩，需要
金戒指和圣树的树枝。
希望你能去收集这些东西。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21894.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>製作傑奇爾聖樁，需要
金指環和聖樹的樹枝。
希望你能去收集這些東西。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21895.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Gold rings can be purchased at the
Accessory Shop in Verinard Castle Town
on the Wena Islands.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21895.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「きんのゆびわは　ウェナ諸島にある
　ヴェリナード城下町の　アクセサリーショップで
　購入することができます。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21895.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 금반지는 웨나 제도에 있는
　베리나드 시가지의 액세서리 상점에서
　구입할 수 있습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21895.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>金戒指可以去维纳群岛的
威里纳德城区，
在饰品商店购买。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21895.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>金指環可以在
維納群島的威里納德城鎮
飾品商店購買。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21896.en:
Holy Branch is dropped by <%sev_que_name0> in the southeastern part of Orphea Region West, across the
river and in Cursed Land.
21896.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「聖木の枝は　オルフェア地方西の南東
　川を渡った地や　呪われた大地などにいる
　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>が　落とします。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21896.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 성목의 가지는 오르페어 지방 서부의 남동쪽
　강 건너편이나 저주받은 땅 등지에 있는
　{%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(이,가) 떨어뜨립니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21896.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>欧鲁非亚西部地区东南边河流对面的地方
或是被诅咒的大地等地栖息着的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
会掉落圣树的树枝。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21896.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>至於聖樹的樹枝，
則是在越過歐菲亞地方西部的東南方河流一帶
或是被詛咒的大地出沒的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>會掉落。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

21897.en:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>You are the one who can move freely
around the world, and we need you to
take on this job. Will you help us?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21897.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「世界を自由に動ける　あなたにこそ
　この仕事を　引き受けてもらいたいのです。
　ご協力　願えませんか？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21897.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 당신은 세상을 자유로이 돌아다닐 수 있으니
　꼭 이 일을 맡아 주셨으면 합니다.
　도와주시겠습니까?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21897.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>你可以在这世界自由活动，
所以我希望你能接下这工作。
你愿意帮忙吗？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
21897.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>你可以自由在這世界活動，
所以我希望你能接下這工作。
你願意幫忙嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
